main.name: Patrick Charlton
main.description: focused on building mobile and web applications with eye-catching UIs and seamless UX design
main.bio:
I aim to use my skills as a software developer to push boundaries, drive innovation, and design effective and efficient software solutions for real world problems. I thrive in collaborative environments with others who constantly push me to become better. 

 While I am a bit of a polyglot programmer, my passion is for front end and mobile engineering as it lets my artistic side shine through the most. The majority of my experience lies in native Android development, as well as hybrid mobile and web development with modern frameworks like React and React Native. 
 Aside from programming, I have achieved success as an athlete and artist through creativity and perseverance. My favorite mediums include watercolors, oils, my trusty fiddle, clean-cut grass on the footy pitch, and untouched snow deep in the mountains.

I spent most of my time running between the music studio, the soccer pitch, and the research lab.
